title: 1130 42 "A History Erased! God Valley of Despair"Transliteration: "Kesa-reta Rekishi! Zetsubō no Goddo Barē" (Japanese:消された歴史！絶望のゴッドバレー) Eri Hyun Jin Tanaka Kazuya Hisada May 25, 2025(2025-05-25) 2.7%[45]
transformers_text: 1130 42 A History Erased God Valley of Despair Transliteration Kes a ret a Re kishi Z et sub no God do Bar Japanese Eri Hyun J in Tanaka Kazuya His ada May 25 2025 2025 05 25 2 7 45 The World Nobles initiate their hunting competition on God Valley Ginny reveals that two Devil Fruits the Fish Fish Fruit Model Azure Dragon and the Paw Paw Fruit are present on the island and are essential to their escape She discloses that she leaked information about God Valley and its hidden treasure to the public prompting both the Rocks Pirates and the Roger Pirates to arrive on the island to raid it Ivan kov and Kuma secure the Devil Fruits but Charlotte Lin lin attacks and seizes the Fish Fish Fruit Kuma consumes the Paw Paw Fruit and confronts Saturn defying the oppressive regime that had enslaved his people Kuma Ivan kov and Ginny return to the Sorbet Kingdom Ivan kov eventually departs while Kuma and Ginny begin a new life of freedom
